title: Thank you and best wishes for 2025!

content.text: As 2024 draws to a close, we wanted to take the opportunity to thank you all for your continued dedication and support in helping make GFiE Life Chance recruitment the success that it is.

With your support, we have been able to offer talented individuals within our communities across the UK a role in the Civil Service.  Our candidates have flourished and many have gone on to develop their careers further in the Civil Service and be promoted.

It was wonderful to see our work mentioned by Simon Case, outgoing Cabinet secretary in his 'valedictory speech’ showcasing the impact that employment within the Civil Service has and how the Civil Service is benefiting from the experiences of individuals in improving the service that the Departments offer to our customers
We wish you all the very best this holiday season and look forward to working with you in 2025.
On behalf of the GFiE team - thank you and best wishes for 2025!
